I adore this jacket. It is a windbreaker, so it is more like a rain jacket than a warm jacket. I deducted one star because this jacket was embroidered with the brand's name on the collarbone side. I decided to cut through all of the yarn and remove it from the jacket because I did not like this. Although the stitching marks are not very noticeable, I do not mind that they were left on the jacket. I did get this jacket in a size up for it to give me an oversized fit. If not, it is pretty true to size, so I would keep this in mind if you want to go for an oversized fit.

I am in LOVE with this jacket! It's breathable, comfortable, and the design is so cute! I love bomber jackets and this one is perfect for spring and fall! It's easily style-able and could go with any blacks, whites, or blues. I would recommend sizing up but other than that this jacket is perfect!

评论详情: I was pretty shocked when I received my item. I know it’s made in China so it’s made smaller but the length is way smaller than what it seems so it’s cropped.
nice jacket. looks true to photos. it is very lightweight perfect for spring

The lightweight construction provides comfort and ease of movement, making them ideal for everyday wear.
i like the style

This is my favorite jacket ever! It's lightweight so it's great to throw over a t-shirt. It has two layers of very thin fabric. I would recommend a size up if you really want the oversized look. The only bad thing is that some of the threads were unraveling after one day. Other than that, it's really cute and would be great for spring!

Good jacket for spring! I like the design & colors. Definitely recommend sizing up 1-2 sizes from your usual size.  Material is soft for me, not loud & crinkly.  I do wish the neck portion was a little sturdier...
Runs really small. I could barel get it on and it’s no way it would zip up. I order my size. So go bigger.

So this jacket is amazing, it's so comfortable. In fact, it's a little big, which is really nice because it has room and can stretch a little

If you're looking for the oversized style, I recommend that you size up once or twice from the jacket size that would normally fit you (I'm 5'10" and would normally wear medium size coats/jackets, but a large helps fit the oversized style, as advertised).  The stitching could've been better, but that's what you get for paying $30~ on a jacket.  Edit: I wanted to come back after wearing it for a few days and give more insight on the jacket: - I recommend that you wash this on delicate settings; however, the stitching is still very prone to coming out. - Contrary to what Cale's five-star review says, this jacket is not soft - it is made of polyester, but not a softer material like cotton. It is, however, very stylish. - The branding/words on the jacket say "Beijiale", not "Pbkabiug" (not that it matters to me).
This jacket is better than expected. Gives a soft and stylish feel. I want to use this as a windbreaker jacket and just a light jacket. It's perfect and well made

I've gotten this as a gift, the stores communication is amazing, they have great customer service I highly value that, the jacket is on the thinner side, it's a cute jacket if u live in warmer countries this is a nice jacket to have but in colder climates I don't highly suggest, solid product
